mapper.insert: insert into car_info (id, model, status, gmt_created, gmt_modified) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{model,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{gmtCreated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into car_info
id,
model,
status,

gmt_modified,

update car_info

status = #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
